meanings.definition: Give official permission for or approval to
meanings.sent1: The teacher authorises the students to go on a field trip.
meanings.sent2: The manager authorises the purchase of new equipment for the office.
meanings.sent3: The principal authorises the class to have a pizza party for good behavior.
meanings.sent4: The judge authorises the release of the defendant on bail.
meanings.sent5: The president authorises the use of military force to protect the country.

meanings.sent1: The constitution authorises the government to make and enforce laws.
meanings.sent2: The court authorises the attorney to represent the client in the case.
meanings.sent3: The king authorises the knight to lead the army into battle.
meanings.sent4: The company authorises the CEO to sign important contracts on its behalf.
meanings.sent5: The board authorises the chairman to make decisions on behalf of the organization.
